characterdesc-alchemyst:
Several chemical compounds adorn your shelves - collected - and cataloged in your mind. Some herbs hang to dry in preparation for their powdered form - to later combine with liquids, undergoing a separate transformation. Your dry hands, though weathered by your work, feel an energy in the substances that surround you. A potency extracted from otherwise mundane materials is nearly magic as you apply it.
You are an Alchemyst - and limitations are yours to redefine.
characterdesc-artisan:
Life hums in the earth. You feel its essence -wet- between your fingers. It is soft, and deep, and warms your heart as you fill your hands with its substance. As the contours of an unfulfilled form flow from the mind into the fingertips, it finds you. The creative heart beats and its design flows through your veins. To the shapeless mass before you is breathed a purpose of your making.
You are an Artisan - and this realm is yours to mold.
characterdesc-chef:
Every familiar aroma that fills the air retains the mystery of the day it first filled your senses. That complex arrangement of every ingredient fills the pallet of your mind. As the fires come to temp, you feel that focus on your tools and the preparation of the meals ahead. As the air around you heats up, the fire within you glows bright - and the food in-front of you will make you warmer still.
You are a Chef - and the master of the meal.
characterdesc-homesteader:
The years stretch out ahead almost as long as the fields upon the plain. In each one a new plan is set, in each month a new action, and in each day - a moment. Slow is the passage of time. Rich is the bounty of earth. It is the vast fruits of Mother Nature's blessing, given up only to the patient. As the wind sweeps across the harvest, so-too do you breathe it in.
You are a Homesteader - and plentiful are your fields.
characterdesc-lumberjack:
Peacefully standing amongst giants, you find comfort at their feet. The bed which you have made your home is shared between the forest and its ilk. These are your family. Some you have given life too, others you will soon put to rest. Every member provides a meaningful contribution to their caretaker. Each a destiny you have, and have yet, to shape.
You are a Lumberjack - and the Wilds of the Realm are your greatest resource.
characterdesc-mason:
Windswept marble basin. The very foundations on which this structure stands. Clean lines cutting through the skyline. Ornate trusses protruding ever so slightly from the buildings fascia. Every element resonates with the precision of mastery. Boldly, it represents the personality of its maker. If it stands, seraph made, it is a statement. With you, it holds a conversation.
You are a Mason - and every construction is your canvas.
characterdesc-merchant:
Quick-witted and with a keen eye for quality, the Merchant knows how to take the goods of others and turn them for a profit. While he can sell any created goods from other classes, the Merchant is actually terrible at making his own wares and relies heavily on other crafters. A relationship between a Merchant and crafter can be equally benefitial and despite their lacking skills at crafting they still tend to be welcomed within communities to bring in more coin.
You are a Merchant - and the Economy of the Realm is yours to Set!
characterdesc-miner:
The sheer hard faces of the earth beneath your feet are not an obstruction - but an invitation. As the surface of the world is given shape by millenia - you give it purpose by your grit and determination. As the mountains rise, they speak to you the stories of the world that lies beneath. That call to purpose is intently listening; to know the earth for every tale it has to tell.
You are a Miner - and the secrets of the Realm are yours.
characterdesc-mystic:
I must protect the secrets at all cost. The Mystic is responsible for persuing knowledge in all its forms and adding it to the city library, which they protect vehemently. In this persuit they attempt to master all forms of magic and gather lost tomes and magic artifacts from the wild lands beyond the city walls.
You are a Mystic - and the Mysteries of the Realm are yours to Discover!
characterdesc-ranger:
There is a call in the wind. The scent upon it shows you your target, and its weakness. Eyes narrowed, a slow rhythm in your chest calms and steadies you. The natural order you obey - and the target has met its peace in the ground. As it rests in your hands, you thank it for the gifts it is about to give - and make no waste of this moment.
You are a Ranger - and the natural order is yours to maintain.
characterdesc-smith:
Staring into the ember glow brings you a warmth beyond what a firepit can achieve. The firm grasp of your subject and the will to give it a form that you desire. As the subject takes shape, it settles in the cool air. This shape now lives out its existence in this form. That it was born from the embers of your forge has tied your desires to reality in a way that no other task can.
You are a Smith - and the ore of the world finds life in your hands.
characterdesc-medic:
A stitch of wounds, a drop of medicine, a gentle touch on pulsing skin. Your hands glide with precision as you stitch the threads of life back together.
What healing concoctions and bandages will you choose next , to nurse the injured back to health? Every patient who leaves is a testament to your dedication.
You Medic - and you bring healing where it is most needed.
characterdesc-tinker:
As rolls forward the papyrus of your mind, dashes and dots of black ink are forming lines, the true measures of the plan is taking time, in the calculations answers you will find, a suggestion that explains distorted time. ~ 'Every quanta is measurable. This world does not contain mysteries - only a set of variables yet to be properly analysed. Pass me my graph-pad and I'll explain.'
You are a Tinker - and no challenge is too complex.
traitdesc-stitch_doctor: Can craft sewing kit and tailored gamboised armor
traitdesc-mercantile: Exclusive craftable Pirate gold coins or Rusty gears
traitdesc-prospector: Crafts cheaper stone bombs, has a primitive blasting powder recipe, and can make bright, waterproof lanterns
traitdesc-artifice: Able to craft carpets, also can craft some paints.
traitdesc-transcription: Able to craft small carpets, also parchment from cattails, papyrus and thatch,also can make a butterfly.
traitdesc-culinary: Able to craft various of the metal cooking pots and can make Jerky old fashion vintage beef.
traitdesc-pioneer: Can extract seeds from produce, craft rich soil, and soil boosters which boost soil fertilty
traitdesc-sentry: Able to craft a bow and also craft arrows.
traitdesc-surgeon: Able to craft a poultice from grass and flowers.
traitdesc-crafty: Able to craft metal parts, a Tuning Spear, and can make scrap weapons, chutes, and mechanical parts with higher efficiency
traitdesc-greenthumb: Can extract seeds from produce, craft rich soil, and soil boosters which boost soil fertilty
traitdesc-mercenary: Can create tools to repair/create forlorn hope armor and blackguard armor as well as shortsword and shield
traitdesc-carpenter: Can craft Elegant Doors, Wagon Wheels, Wallpapers and cheaper Firewood, Boards, Lumberjack Axe and Sticks
traitdesc-mason: Creates mortar, plaster, refractory, and other raw bricks at lower costs, can directly make stone bricks from stones, and has access to brown clay bricks.
traitdesc-smith: Can use tool kits to repair armor and shields, create a metal pans and crafts cheaper ore-bombs and blasting powder.
charattribute-forageDropRate-0.25: +25% chance for an extra forage drop
charattribute-forageDropRate-0.3: +30% chance for an extra forage drop
charattribute-forageDropRate-0.5: +50% chance for an extra forage drop
charattribute-forageDropRate--0.2: 20% chance to get fewer/no forage drops
charattribute-forageDropRate--0.15: 15% chance to get fewer/no forage drops
charattribute-oreDropRate-0.4: +50% added chance to get double ore
charattribute-oreDropRate-0.15: +22.5% added chance to get double ore
charattribute-oreDropRate--0.2: No chance to get double ores
charattribute-oreDropRate--0.1: -12.5% subtracted chance to get double ore
charattribute-charcoalPileDropRate-0.35: +35% chance to get double charcoal from charcoal pit piles
charattribute-stickDropRate-0.5: +50% chance to get double sticks from branches
charattribute-produceDropRate-0.3: +30% extra produce when harvesting planted crops
charattribute-produceDropRate-0.2: +20% extra produce when harvesting planted crops
allclasses:craftinginfo-allclasses-text: This mod adds a number of new classes and traits to the game, allowing for greater specialization and variety in gameplay. Each class comes with a unique set of traits that provide bonuses to certain skills and abilities.
game:itemdesc-axe-lumberjack-steel: Dream of every grown man. Especially the one that feel the woods like his home. It cuttting the trees like blades of grass.
